sentences.en: Among people, ambiguity in sexuality and indefinable emotions, cause them to drift afloat endlessly.
sentences.cn: 人与人之间, 性别的模糊化,情感的无法划分定位, 造就了她他们漂浮的缺乏节制的游离状态.

sentences.en: An indefinable sadness had come over Huei - fang these last few days.
sentences.cn: 四小姐这无名的惆怅也是最近三四天内才有的.

sentences.en: His head felt lighter in some indefinable way.
sentences.cn: 他的头不知为何有点晕眩。

sentences.en: In some indefinable way, Twain had conveyed his charismatic self to Keller.
sentences.cn: 从某种不可理喻的角度上来说, 吐温把自己的超凡魅力传达给了凯勒.

sentences.en: Like all great cities, New York has an indefinable aura 1 all its own.
sentences.cn: 纽约像其他大城市一样, 有它自己难以形容的气氛.
她感到一种难以名状的悲伤。

sentences.en: She has that indefinable something that makes an actress a star.
sentences.cn: 她具备了那种使演员成为明星的说不出的特质。

sentences.en: She lacks the indefinable charm of weakness.
sentences.cn: 她缺少那种难以形容的软弱的媚态.

sentences.en: The vision leaves an indefinable longing and regret.
sentences.cn: 这种景象留给人们一种莫名的渴望和遗憾.

sentences.en: There was something indefinable in her eyes.
sentences.cn: 她的眼神里有种难以确定的东西。

sentences.en: There's an indefinable air of tension at the meeting.
sentences.cn: 会议上有种难以描述的紧张气氛.

sentences.en: There's an indefinable air of tension in this town.
sentences.cn: 这城镇里有种难以描述的紧张气氛.

sentences.en: These gentlemen had an indefinable mistrust of her good offices.
sentences.cn: 这些先生们对她的好意殷勤抱有难以名状的戒心.

sentences.en: These words were uttered with an indefinable sound which startled the girl.
sentences.cn: 这些话的口气有些暧昧,它使姑娘吃了一惊.

words.tran_cn: 不确定的；无限的；模糊的
不确定地，无限期地；模糊地，不明确地
难下定义的；难确定的；模糊不清的

trans.tran_cn: 难下定义的，难确切表达的，神秘的，不可思议的
难下定义的事物；难以确切描述的事物
